title: Win by Focusing on Your Core Users
description: Shane Murphy-Reuter is the President of Go-To-Market at Calendly, a leading scheduling software platform trusted by millions. With a proven track record in scaling SaaS companies like Intercom and Webflow, Shane brings deep expertise in product-led growth, sales strategy, and category creation. In this episode, he shares how Calendly has evolved beyond scheduling to serve SMBs and solopreneurs through AI-driven relationship management tools. Tune in to learn how focusing on your core users can drive sustainable growth, outpace competitors, and spark innovation in a crowded market.
